title: LOTR: Battle for Middle Earth II BFME2 RoTWK- Complete package
description:
Lord of the Rings: The Battle For Middle Earth II RoTWK complete package. I made this torrent to preserve the game and programs needed to run it as I loved the game so much I needed to make sure there was a backup of it.

This includes everything needed to run the game and its community patches and updates. Included are:

BFME2 RoTWK iso
BFME2 RoTWK mini-images
WinCDEmu (to mount iso and images)
BFME2 Patcher Switcher
BFME2 RoTWK Crash fixer Vista,7,8,10
EA Games KeyGen program
PDFs copies of install instructions and troubleshooting steps

With third party apps such as gameranger, multiplayer over WAN is even possible as long as all players in the game are patched to the same version. Shout-out tofor the ISOs and continued support of the game.

Extracted size: 4.17GB
